_comment: This is a template file. Copy and modify to create new exercises.
name: Exercise Name
description: Brief description of the exercise and its benefits

_detection_types.angle: Measures angle between 3 landmarks (e.g., hip-knee-ankle for squats)
_detection_types.height_baseline: Tracks landmark height vs first-frame baseline (e.g., shoulder shrugs)
_detection_types.height_relative: Tracks landmark height relative to another (e.g., knee vs hip for high knees)
_detection_types.position_relative: Checks if landmark is above/below another (e.g., wrist above shoulder)
_detection_types.distance: Measures distance between landmarks (e.g., elbow to opposite knee)
_detection_types.width_ratio: Compares width ratios (e.g., shoulders vs hips for twists)
_detection_types.quadrant_tracking: Tracks motion through quadrants (e.g., arm circles)

instructions.ready: Get ready instruction shown at start
